    Agensi Pekerjaan AN Asia Sdn Bhd Vacancies Japanese Speaking Customer Service Support

    October 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Agensi Pekerjaan AN Asia Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Japanese Speaking Customer Service Support position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Job Description
    • Planning, implementation and management of a travel promotion project  in cooperation with the travel industry
    • Conduct a presentation for travel promotion,attend in seminars and workshops,Hearing and market research of travel agency
    • Survey on the Islamic Market,Database management,customer service
    • Translatation tasks 
    • Other general office work.
    Requirements
    • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, any field.
    • Required language(s): English, Japanese
    • At least 2 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
    • Preferably Senior Executives specializing in Hotel Management/Tourism Services or equivalent.
    • Preferable candidate from Tourism Media.
    • Full-Time position(s) available.

    Company Overview

    Agensi Pekerjaan AN Asia Sdn Bhd is a company established by Malaysia - Japan partnership. One of the founders is a Malaysian studying abroad in Japan and living in Japan for over 15 years, also created a Malaysian's Japanese Language Community where connecting Malaysian who living in Japan. We believe that this is one of our strength to bring in talented people from Japan to meet the needs of the company. The objective of AN Asia is to create an opportunities for people and companies to meet each other's needs. 
    We are looking forward to support on your career advancement and contribute to your business in Malaysia.
    人材紹介会社AN ASIA（エイエヌアジア）は、マレーシア-日本のパートナーシップによって設立された企業です。創業者の1人は、日本に留学し、日本に15年以上在住しているマレーシア人。そのため、日本語が堪能なマレーシア人コミュニティとのつながりが深いという強みがあります。
    日系人材企業でキャリアを積んだコンサルタントが中心となって、求職者、人材をお探しの企業、それぞれの希望をじっくりとお聞きし、双方にとって有益な人選をいたします。
    企業様にとってはマレーシアにおけるビジネス拡大につながり、また、求職者にとってはよりよいキャリアを築いていける、そんな出会いを精一杯サポートいたします。

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hotel job in Kuala Lumpur.
    Apply Online
